item.title: CVE-2023-51420|2023-12-29T09:16:33.808Z -- soft8soft%20llc -- verge3d%20publishing%20and%20e-commerce
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Soft8Soft LLC Verge3D Publishing and E-Commerce.This issue affects Verge3D Publishing and E-Commerce: from n/a through 4.5.2.
